overview: James is a passionate indie film fan who voluteers for two bitch gay neophyte filmmakers claiming they are making the best gay indie film ever. While James is a believer of Cris Pablo digital movie-making, his new employers are among Pablo's most vocal haters. Despite this James pursues to experience the seciting world director Chumz. And there's his ultimate crush, the straight eye candy hunk Xander Reyes, who will do anything for a role in any indie flick. Can James and the gang survive the turbulent world of indie movie-making?
title: Subok
